form: <fieldset name="fields" addfieldpath="/<% if(data.projectEnv=='admin') {%>administrator/<% }%>components/<%=data.componentName%>/models/fields"> <% data.fields.forEach(function(field){ %> <field name="<%=field.name%>" type="<%=field.type%>" default="" class="form-control" <% if (field.type=='hidden'){%> readonly="true"<% }%><% if (field.required){%> required="required"<% }%> label="<%=s('com_'+data.projectName+'_field_'+field.name+'_label').toUpperCase().value()%>" description="<%=s('com_'+data.projectName+'_field_'+field.name+'_desc').toUpperCase().value()%>" /> <% });%>
